name: TwitterOAuth Demo
description: Demo of the most popular PHP library for use with the Twitter OAuth REST API.

CONSUMER_KEY.description: Consumer Key from app registered at https://apps.twitter.com/.

CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Consumer Secret from app registered at https://apps.twitter.com/.

OAUTH_CALLBACK.description: Callback URL from app registered at https://apps.twitter.com/. If site is hosted at https://example.herokuapp.com/ use https://example.herokuapp.com/callback.php.

GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ID.description: Google Analytics if you would like to measure traffic to the demo site.

FORCE_TLS.description: Enable if you are running on a host with HTTPS.

HOST.description: The subdomain and domain the site is running on. E.g. example.com or example.herokuap.com.

DEBUG.description: Debug disables some things you only want running in production.
